verses.verse: Preserve <S%H8104><s%> me, <S%H410><s%> God, for in you do I take refuge. <S%H2620><s%>
My soul, <S%H559><s%> you have said to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> "You are my Lord. <S%H3068><s%> Apart from you I have no good thing. <S%H2896><s%>"
As for the saints <S%H6918><s%> who <S%H1992><s%> are in the earth, <S%H776><s%> they are the excellent <S%H117><s%> ones in whom is all my delight. <S%H2656><s%>

Their sorrows <S%H6094><s%> shall be multiplied <S%H7235><s%> who give <S%H4116><s%> gifts to another <S%H312><s%> god. <S%H5262><s%> Their drink offerings of blood <S%H1818><s%> I will not offer, <S%H5258><s%> nor <S%H1077><s%> take <S%H5375><s%> their names <S%H8034><s%> on my lips. <S%H8193><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> assigned <S%H2506><s%> my portion <S%H4490><s%> and my cup. <S%H3563><s%> You made <S%H8551><s%> my lot secure. <S%H1486><s%>
The lines <S%H2256><s%> have fallen <S%H5307><s%> to me in pleasant <S%H5273><s%> places. <S%H8231><s%> Yes, I have a good inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>
I will bless <S%H1288><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> who has given me counsel. <S%H3289><s%> Yes, <S%H3629><s%> my heart instructs <S%H3256><s%> me in the night seasons. <S%H3915><s%>
I have set <S%H7737><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> always <S%H8548><s%> before me. <S%H3225><s%> Because he is at my right hand, I shall not be moved. <S%H4131><s%>
Therefore my heart <S%H3820><s%> is glad, <S%H8055><s%> and my tongue <S%H3519><s%> rejoices. <S%H1523><s%> My body <S%H1320><s%> shall also dwell <S%H7931><s%> in safety. <S%H983><s%>
For you will not leave <S%H5800><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> in Sheol, <S%H7585><s%> neither will you allow <S%H5414><s%> your holy one <S%H2623><s%> to see <S%H7200><s%> corruption. <S%H7845><s%>

You will show <S%H3045><s%> me the path <S%H734><s%> of life. <S%H2416><s%> In your presence <S%H6440><s%> is fullness <S%H7648><s%> of joy. <S%H8057><s%> In your right hand <S%H3225><s%> there are pleasures <S%H5273><s%> forevermore. <S%H5331><s%>
